item.title: Foundations. Why Britain has stagnated - audiobook
item.description: I highly recommend you read the original webpage as it has a lot of excellent infographics. It mentions Lessons from the age of coal as one of its sources. Duration: 1:48:25 OPUS audio (without outro) Code: Makefile, piper-make-audiobook by Andriy Utkin, Public domain / CC0 Original, outro © Ben Southwood, Samuel Hughes, Sam Bowman. All rights reserved. Cached, outro © Ben Southwood, Samuel Hughes, Sam Bowman. All rights reserved.

item.description: Duration: 1:15:47 OPUS audio Code: Makefile, piper-make-audiobook by Andriy Utkin, Public domain / CC0 PDF original link © 2024 Emily Omier Consulting. All rights reserved. PDF cached © 2024 Emily Omier Consulting. All rights reserved.

item.title: Police of Minneapolis report - audiobook
item.description: There’s this DoJ report about abuse of force by Minneapolis police, of George Floyd fame. Duration: 4:40:06 OPUS audio MP3 audio Source code PDF original link PDF cached License: Public domain / CC0. (The original document is public domain.) I make “audiobooks” for myself to consume large texts non-visually, or to augment reading. This is such a case. Mostly the results have terrible quality which I got used to. I use open source text to speech systems and pre-process the text only very lightly.
